sentences.sentence: Your baby will begin to vocalize long before she can talk.
sentences.translation: 你的女婴在会说话前很早就要开始咿呀发声了。

sentences.sentence: Showing children pictures sometimes helps them to vocalize their ideas.
sentences.translation: 让儿童看图画有时有助于他们用言语表达思想。

sentences.sentence: In India and Bali students learn to vocalize music before ever picking up instruments.
sentences.translation: 在印度和巴厘岛，学生们在开始学习乐器前要先学唱歌。
